articles.author: Scott Nover, Jeremy Barr
articles.title: Disney brings back Jimmy Kimmel, sidelined after Charlie Kirk comments - The Washington Post
articles.description: “Jimmy Kimmel Live!” on ABC was taken off air following backlash from President Donald Trump, FCC Chairman Brendan Carr, Nexstar, Sinclair and a bevy of conservative critics.
articles.content: Jimmy Kimmel will return to television Tuesday, nearly one week after Disney-owned ABC took his long-running late-night talk show, Jimmy Kimmel Live!, off the air under pressure from the Trump admini… [+125 chars]
